erjang
Class ErjangConfig

java.lang.Object
  erjang.ErjangConfig

public class ErjangConfig
extends java.lang.Object

Reads a configuration file at system startup, and provides access to the settings therein. The configuration file is a Java 'properties' file (as defined by java.util.Properties), and its location is defined by the Java property "erjang.configfile".
